thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Kieran Buggy

author: Kieran Buggy
title: Kieran Buggy
text: My service was prompt and smooth from the opening exchange. After a simple Quote: request i received a phone call about my Quote: and then quickly provided an email with options for my order. This made it easy to see the final product as well as costs involved. The final service was very efficient and the products turned out to be a high quality. Thanks for the help
